text: Hi! I want to see a simulation of the solar system, so I thought of using the NBodySimulator.jl to do that, and to get the initial data to start it with from JPLEphemeris.jl. Does this sound like a good plan?

elements.text: Hi! I want to see a simulation of the solar system, so I thought of using the NBodySimulator.jl to do that, and to get the initial data to start it with from JPLEphemeris.jl. Does this sound like a good plan?

text:
You tell us! Did it work?
There's probably oodles of blogppsts to have done this in Matlab/Fortran/C, no a bad blogppst tbh.
